attributes.action: Parliamentary expenses should be means tested like benefits.
attributes.background: We hear too many stories of wealthy MPs claiming for unnecessary items on expenses or in their second home allowances. Access to these benefits should be means tested similar to how DWP benefits are. MPs who can afford to cover their own costs, should. An austerity measure we can all agree with.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority makes decisions relating to MP's expenses and business costs and is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

If you would like to contact IPSA to make this suggestion, here’s how to contact them:

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/About%20Us/Pages/Contact-Us.aspx
